title: Nora
description: The earthquake has destroyed her city, but not her dreams! As companion to a wealthy San Francisco socialite, poor Nora gets a glimpse of the world of the rich and is determined to be a part of it. Then the Great Earthquake happens, and Nora rescues a handsome stranger who is arrested for robbery. Even so, she falls in love with him. If only she can prove his innocence.
author: Jeffie Ross Gordon
